Class DamageTile

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.server.actions.effects.Damage
      • it.polimi.se2019.server.actions.effects.DamageTile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Effect

    public class DamageTile
extends Damage
    This effect damages all the players in the indicated tile.
    Author:
    andreahuang

    • Constructor Detail

      • DamageTile

        protected DamageTile(java.lang.Integer amount,
                     java.lang.String actionUnitName,
                     boolean self)
        Default constructor. It sets up the amount of damage to inflict, and it also has an additional name of action unit for correct targeting.
        Parameters:
        amount - is the amount of damage to inflict.
        actionUnitName - the action unit used for correct targeting.
        self - is a boolean that indicates whether the tile to shoot is the attacker's or another target's tile.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run(Game game,
                java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<Targetable>> targets)
        This method adds damage to all players in the indicated tile.
        Parameters:
        game - the game on which to perform the effect.
        targets - the targets is the input of the current player. Either tiles or players.
